Package engine

Class Distance

java.lang.Object
engine.Distance
Direct Known Subclasses:
DistanceMixed
public class Distance
extends java.lang.Object
Distance measures a theoretical distance from target to all database source samples. It outputs a list of source samples with their respective distance to target in ascending distance order.

  • Constructor Summary
